Infectra: I hope so. What should I do around here? *Infectra says to Airbom=
ber*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
  Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 6:07 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


=
  "He was just mean, not all Maximals are like him." Airbomber said to Infe=
ctra...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To=
: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 5:02 AM
    Subject: =
Re: Neo Beast Wars


    Wrath: I guess. I haven't looked in a little bit. =
Who is this? *Wrath said pointing at Infectra* Infectra: I'm Infectra. You?=
 *Infectra held her hand out for a hand shake* *Wrath raised an eye brow* W=
rath: I'm Wrath. *Wrath says turning away from Infectra and exiting the bas=
e* *Infectra frowns*
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECOD=
E 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 4:27 AM
=
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      "Hello, Wrath, nice eather we're =
having, huh?" Stranato said, smiling at Wrath, trying to be nice even thoug=
h he really wanted to insult him...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
       From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent:=
 Friday, July 07, 2000 4:07 AM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      =
  *Infectra nodded and looked around not really knowing who to choose*

   =
     *Then Wrath steps out of the CR Chamber and see's The Radicons with In=
fectra and walks up to them*
          ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
    From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday=
, July 07, 2000 3:26 AM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          "=
Whomever seems friendliest." Airbomber replied to Infectra...
            -=
---- Original Message ----- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
           =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 9:01 PM
=
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            Infectra: Okay, umm..=
..which one??? *Infectra says to Airbomber*
              ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
              From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
              Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 7:56 PM
              Subj=
ect: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              "Well, you shall be amazed at how m=
uch Liono screwed up the future, but you should go and get aquainted with s=
ome of the other bots." Airbomber said to Infectra...
                -----=
 Original Message ----- 
                From: ilovealllizards 
           =
     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 =
4:43 PM
                Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                *Infe=
ctra nodded and looked around* Infectra: What should I expect to happen or =
find out here? *Infectra says to The Radicons*
                  ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
                  From: THECODE 
                  To: =
nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 4:49 AM=

                  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                  "Give th=
em a chance, I'm sure they'll like you." Airbomber whispered back to Infect=
ra...
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                   =
 From: ilovealllizards 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
       =
             Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 3:23 AM
                    Subj=
ect: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                    *Infectra smiles waves to any=
 bots in the Maxi base* Infectra: I don't think they like me. *Infectra whi=
spers to Airbomber*
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
                   From: THECODE 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
                      Sent: Wednesday, July 05, 2000 11:47 PM
        =
              Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                      "Sure, we=
'll tell ya." Airbomber said, making sure nobody was aiming their blaster's=
 at Infectra.

                      "Hey, everyone! This is Infectra! She'=
s with us!" Airbomber said. Plintissa growled.

                      "Thes=
e Radicons fired at me, Artist, and Dracona when we tried to help them and =
ran away! I don't think they could be trusted!" Plintissa said.

          =
            "We have our gestalt form and we're useful and powerful." Stran=
ato said. Plintissa walked away angrily...
                        ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
                        From: ilovealllizards 
      =
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                        Sent: Tue=
sday, July 04, 2000 7:12 PM
                        Subject: Re: Neo Beast =
Wars


                        *Infectra nods and follows the Radicons* Inf=
ectra: How can you tell if one is not to be trusted? *Infectra says to the =
Radicons*
                          ----- Original Message ----- 
         =
                 From: THECODE 
                          To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
                          Sent: Tuesday, July 04, 2000 5:36 PM
     =
                     Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                          Si=
nesis and Sinister both kept poking each other, but saying nothing when the=
 other looked. They both grabbed their swords and were about to stab each o=
ther, but they put the swords away and did a cheesy hug instead.

         =
                 Plintissa and Dracona decided to follow Artist and they wa=
lked off to the Ark. Once there, they entered the base.

                  =
        "Hey, have any of you seen a bot come by here just staring?" Plinti=
ssa asked. Dracona started to look around in logical places a lunatic might=
 hide.

                          Deemos and Inzola got bored of sitting ar=
ound and drinking tea and they left again.

                          "Who =
shall we join with, dear?" Inzola asked.

                          "Whomev=
er wants out assistance." Deemos replies. They walk on until they see the A=
lliance base.

                          "This one looks good, lets go and =
ask them if they have any need for us!" Deemos said. Inzola and Deemos walk=
ed up to the base.

                          "Ahem, excuse us, but we're l=
ooking to join your fine team, we have been looking for a faction to join, =
and it appears that it is you who will obviously win the Neo Beast Wars, so=
 we wish to join you, what fo we have to do to join?" Deemos asked. (Someth=
ing reasonable, please, no killing a bot things or anything.)

            =
              Gangon had a nightmare, He was again tied to the magical chai=
r when Sinister and Sinesis came up to him. Then BrightBlade did, and then =
Dracona. They all pulled of their masks and were 2 headed, one head Inzola,=
 and the other head Deemos. Gangon screamed and held hbis head in pain. Gan=
gon woke up, and remembered that he couldn't move. He considered that thing=
 about getting a replacement body, how it would be a good idea just in case=
 he had to get out of this dump, which was probable if he wanted to kill hi=
mself. He waited for Plintissa and Dracona to come back.

                 =
         The Radicons looked at Infectra.

                          "Now, =
all you need to do is follow us, we have set you on friend of the Maximals,=
 I'm sure they won't mind, seeing as how you would make a great addition to=
 their group." Airbomber said. They walked inside of the Maximal base, wait=
ing for Infectra to follow.

                          Artist walked around=
 the war room in circles, not quite knowing where he was going.



--------=

--
